meanings.definition: A room or building where people work at desks
meanings.sent1: My dad's office has a big desk and a computer.
meanings.sent2: She went to the office to finish her work on time.
meanings.sent3: The office was so messy, it looked like a tornado hit it!
meanings.sent4: Her office was her sanctuary, a place of productivity and focus.
meanings.sent5: The office hummed with the sound of keyboards clicking and phones ringing.

meanings.definition: A duty or function assigned to someone
meanings.sent1: His office was to make sure everyone arrived on time.
meanings.sent2: Completing the project on time was her office.
meanings.sent3: His office was to guard the secret recipe for the best cookies in town.
meanings.sent4: Her office as team captain was to lead by example.
meanings.sent5: The office of being a big brother meant always looking out for his little sister.

meanings.definition: A position of authority or trust
meanings.sent1: She held the office of class president with pride.
meanings.sent2: The CEO's office was on the top floor of the building.
meanings.sent3: His office as the king's advisor was to give wise counsel.
meanings.sent4: In her office as the judge, she had to make fair decisions.
meanings.sent5: The office of being the eldest sibling meant setting a good example for the younger ones.

meanings.definition: A service or duty performed for another
meanings.sent1: It was her office to help the elderly cross the street safely.
meanings.sent2: He saw it as his office to always lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent3: Her office as a volunteer was to bring joy to those in need.
meanings.sent4: In his office as a mentor, he guided many young minds to success.
meanings.sent5: The office of being a good friend meant being there through thick and thin.
